ProteinName	Voltage-dependent calcium channel gamma-like subunit (Neuronal voltage-gated calcium channel gamma-like subunit) (Transmembrane protein 37)
GeneName	TMEM37 PR
Length	190
Function	Thought to stabilize the calcium channel in an inactivated (closed) state. Modulates calcium current when coexpressed with CACNA1G (By similarity).
Subcellular Location	Membrane
